column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We had to wait a little
column2: but it was worth it. You're able to order ahead so once you're seated
column3: you don't have to wait too long until your order comes out. Tons to choose from off the menu and I'm sure you can't go wrong. For us
column4: we ordered the Chicken Louie Pasta and the Malnati Chicago Pizza
column5: which was filling and so so so hearty. We loved it! It definitely hit the spot on a chilly day.
